p.e:
DR. BROWEL WOULD KIDNAP AND EXPERIMENT ON ANY AGE FROM
INFANT TO ELDERLY. MANY OF HIS TEST SUBJECTS HAVE EITHER
DIED OR GONE COMPLETELY BRAIN DEAD, WHICH HE WOULD KILL
LATER ON. AS HE EXPERIMENTED ON MORE PEOPLE HIS TEST BECAME
MORE AND MORE SUCCESSFUL. THEY BECAME SO SUCCESSFUL THAT 
THEY STARTED TO BECOME UNCONTROLABLE. HIS TEST SUBJECTS 
STARTED TO ATTACK BECAUSE THE ORIGINAL PERSON WAS STILL
CONSCIOUS INSIDE THERE MUTILATED BODIES. ALTHOUGH THEIR
BODIES WERE DECAYING, THEY STILL HAD ENOUGH STRENGTH TO KILL
AND DESTROY THE DR. BROWEL AND HIS LABORITORY.
